name: Charles
description: For marketers who want to drive cost-efficient business growth in times of growing acquisition costs and changing consumer preferences, charles is a conversational marketing platform and AI that sits on top of CRMs/CDPs to drive revenue. It serves WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, and Instagram Direct. Its integration options, messenger-native features, intuitive UI and a clear playbook on use cases make it to easy to adopt and grow revenue and efficiency within their marketing mix. Based out of Germany, charles' platform stands for enterprise-grade IT security, scalability and GDPR-compliance.
focus_areas: Journeys: automate and personalize message flows to save time and effort
Campaigns: interface to create, send and analyze WhatsApp marketing campaigns to 100,000s of customers
Conversations: WhatsApp messaging inbox to manage chats across teams
